data.title: Brace Sproul - Head Of Applied AI at LangChain
data.snippet:
Join Prog.AI to see contacts

### Summary

ü§©

Rockstar

Brace Sproul is Head of Applied AI at LangChain in the San Francisco Bay Area, leading applied work on agents, orchestration frameworks, and evaluation/observability after six years in software engineering. Known as a "trace tackler" at LangChain, he focuses on observability and debugging complex agent behavior while contributing to flagship open-source projects like langchainjs, LangGraph, Open Canvas, and chat-langchain. He combines product-minded full‚Äëstack engineering with prior founder and technical lead experience to translate research prototypes into polished, production-ready tooling. Brace also consults on agent design and orchestration, helping teams operationalize LLM systems and improve evaluation workflows. [...] Contributions:26 reviews, 259 PRs, 296 pushes in 5 months

Contributions summary:Brace appears to be a full-stack developer primarily focused on implementing new features and improving the user interface of the chat application. Their contributions include creating a simple chatbot functionality, refactoring existing code, and implementing new UI components. These changes span both frontend and backend aspects of the application, from the creation of content composer components to the definition of API endpoints.

data.title: Brace Sproul | Applied AI Engineer
data.snippet:
# BRACE SPROUL

HEAD OF APPLIED AI @ LANGCHAIN

AI/ML Engineer heading LangChain's Applied AI team. Interested in agents, drones, and rockets.

## EXPERIENCE

San Francisco

Head of Applied AI

March 2025 - Present

Applied AI Engineer

October 2023 - March 2025

San Francisco

Tech Lead | Full Stack Engineer

October 2022 - October 2023

Core team member developing Create's code generation AI agent using OpenAI's GPT via LangChain.

Working across a full TypeScript stack, building various features and products, including code generation using LLMs, infrastructure and database architecture, along with web apps.

### Linear IO Services

Remote

Full Stack Engineer Contract

September 2022 - January 2023 [...] September 2022 - January 2023

As a contract software engineer, I worked on small-medium sized projects for a range of clients, using a full-stack approach with technologies including TypeScript, GraphQL, PostgreSQL and Firebase to deliver high-quality solutions, services and applications.

### 510 Kickz LLC

Berkeley CA

Founder

July 2017 - September 2021

Founded a bulk aftermarket distribution company that specialized in footwear and apparel. Over $1M in lifetime sales with hundreds enterprise scale businesses, and direct to consumer.

## OPEN SOURCE

### LIBRARIES I'M A CORE MAINTAINER OF

### LangChain.js

Build context-aware reasoning applications. A TypeScript framework with millions of monthly downloads.

### LangGraph.js

data.title: How LangChain Found a Trusted Partner for Their Sandbox Needs
data.snippet:
As a leader in open‚Äësource agent development, LangChain‚Äôs bread and butter is building, orchestrating, and deploying agents seamlessly for developers and non‚Äëtechnical users alike. To advance this mission, Brace Sproul, Head of Applied AI, and his team built a cloud‚Äëhosted coding agent that runs autonomously end to end. To open-source it reliably, they needed to nail one thing: their sandbox partner. [...] langchain.com

langchain.com

Linkedin

Linkedin

Linkedin

Learn how the leading open-source agent engineering platform partnered with Daytona to ensure secure, instant, and persistent sandboxes for their production-ready coding agent.

#### Our mission is to be the one place developers go for all their agent needs. Daytona is the only tech partner that could support our sandbox needs and make this possible.

Brace Sproul

Head of Applied AI at LangChain

###### 01 -- CHALLENGE

### Deploying Open-Source Coding Agents Called for a Reliable Sandbox Infrastructure Partner [...] #### If anybody asked me which runtime platform to use, I'm going to 100% say Daytona every time. With their SDK, we never have to worry about an agent leaking or taking actions that it shouldn't. I haven't seen this anywhere else.

Brace Sproul

Head of Applied AI at LangChain
